participant_1.background:
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
i have ink stains on all my shirts.
i like reading mystery novels.
I'd love to explore the country side with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian.

participant_2.background:
I dance to K-pop music to express myself.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
i enjoy home cooked meals.
lately i ve been learning how to garden.
i work some very odd jobs.

content.text: Hi there, I'm happy to meet you!
Hello! Nice to meet you too!
I enjoy dancing to K-pop music, home cooked meals, and learning how to garden.
Wow, those are all great interests! I enjoy reading mystery novels, researching weird and wonderful things, and exploring the country side with my lifted Chevy truck.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been in a lifted Chevy truck before.
It's really fun! It's great for off-roading and exploring the country side.
I would love to go for a ride in one sometime!
That would be fun! I'd be happy to take you for a ride sometime.
What kind of mystery novels do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of mystery novels, but my favorites are usually the ones that have a lot of twists and turns.
I like those too! They keep me guessing the whole time.
Me too! They're so much fun to read.
I'm glad we have similar interests!
Me too! It makes for good conversation
